summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Government Performance and Financial Management Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on March 25, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Briefing Room, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via video conference, aimed at discussing various financial and operational matters impacting the city.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the February 26, 2024 meeting.
2. Briefings on the impact of AI in local government permit review, the 2023 external audit, updates from the Inspector General, and a review of the annual investment policy.
3. Monthly performance updates from Development Services and a review of city real estate for development opportunities.

**Important Details**:  
- Presentations will be made by representatives from AutoReview.AI regarding AI's role in permit review and by Weaver for the external audit discussion.
- The committee will also review the FY 2022-23 budget versus actual end-of-year report and audit findings related to minority and women-owned business enterprises.
- Upcoming agenda items include authorizing ordinances for bond issuances and a public property finance contract with JP Morgan Chase.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval for the meeting minutes and will discuss various proposals, including the annual investment policy and updates on budget accountability. Additionally, they will review and potentially approve upcoming financial agreements and contracts related to city operations.
